Posts.EditableText: I'm glad the saves are fixed now, and the speed is a little better too. But some games still won't save. Is it because of the size limit in my browser. I'm currently using chrome. Just wondering.
Posts.HTML: I'm glad the saves are fixed now, and the speed is a little better too. But some games still won't save. Is it because of the size limit in my browser. I'm currently using chrome. Just wondering.

Posts.EditableText: Can you give an example of a game you’re having trouble with?
Posts.HTML: Can you give an example of a game you’re having trouble with?

Posts.EditableText: I have trouble with only really expansive games. I can play them, but I can't save them. I was just wondering if the size of games affects whether or not I can save. I mean because of the web browser's storage limits.
Posts.HTML: I have trouble with only really expansive games. I can play them, but I can't save them. I was just wondering if the size of games affects whether or not I can save. I mean because of the web browser's storage limits.

Posts.EditableText: Post a link to one of the games that has the problem, and I’ll be able to investigate.
Posts.HTML: Post a link to one of the games that has the problem, and I’ll be able to investigate.

Posts.EditableText: Never mind, I found the answer, which is what I thought. The problem really was the size of the games. Apparently, the browser storage limit prevented the saving because they were too big.(Sorry for taking so long to respond. I had some trouble with my computer. A glitch caused it to reset my account, and I needed time to restore what I could.)
